actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to require manufacture, sale, or import of a minimum number of motor vehicles that met certain standards for drunk and impaired driving prevention, and for other purposes.
short_title: Deployment of Required Impairment Prevention Vehicle Equipment to Honor the Abbas Family Legacy to Terminate Drunk Driving Act of 2025

titles.title: DRIVE to HALT Drunk Driving Act
Deployment of Required Impairment Prevention Vehicle Equipment to Honor the Abbas Family Legacy to Terminate Drunk Driving Act of 2025
DRIVE to HALT Drunk Driving Act

To amend title 49, United States Code, to require manufacture, sale, or import of a minimum number of motor vehicles that met certain standards for drunk and impaired driving prevention, and for other purposes.
